text: Hi Eric - would an endpoint that allows you to fetch the V3 ID from the V1 ID be helpful? Or are you suggesting that you need endpoints to fetch bidirectionally from V1->V3 and V3->V1?
Hi Justin, an endpoint to fetch the V3 ID given the V1 ID would be great! That way, when my integration is syncing contact lists, it can convert the V1 ID to V3 if we don't have a V3 ID on file yet.
Our team needs help with migrating from V1 ID's to V3 as well. Having this endpoint would be very helpful!
Thanks for the feedback, we are taking a look into making such an endpoint available in the V3 API
